resources:
HP Quiz Welcome in Harry Potter quiz!
What creature is depicted in the emblem for Griffindor house? An eagle A lion + A badger A snake
Professor Dumbledore\'s spectacles are rectangular? True False +
Which Hogwarts student says, "I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me"? Ron Weasley Harry Potter + Fred Weasley Draco Malfoy
What is the incantation for the Summoning Charm? Accio + Anapneo Aperecium Avis
How are parcels and letters sent in the wizarding world? Via wizard postmen Via the Floo Network Via broomstick Via owls +
What do Harry and Ron crash into when they fly Arthur Weasley\'s Ford Anglia to Hogwarts? The Great Lake The Hogwarts Express The Whomping Willow + The Astronomy Tower
What colour is the Hogwarts Express? Scarlet
Members of Ravenclaw house are known for possessing which two of the following traits? Loyalty Intelligence + Cunning Wit +
Write your answer
Click \"send\" to know your score Send
